title: Why has the construction of the KFC in Burgaw across from McDonalds taken so long? Seams like it has been about 1 to 2 years since they started on it. Does it have anything to do with the rumor of Hardees trying to stop it from coming?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20091217/ARTICLES/912179997
